summary:
This is a compatibility patch "Expanded Towns and Cities (version 13.0 or more)" to "Realistic Needs and Diseases".
Old RND patch don't follow ETaC in these days.
So I make it.
descriptionHtml:
This is a compatibility patch  "Expanded Towns and Cities (version 13.0 or more)" to "Realistic Needs and Diseases".
Old RND patch don't follow ETaC in these days.
So I make it.

This is not simple compatibility patch.
It changes some futures.
1 Pumpkins has more weight & cost.
2 Flour & Sugar are popular ingredients many other MOD.
I rename the ingredients for distinction easily.

=Required MOD=
"ETaC - RESOURCES.esm"  (Expanded Towns and Cities 13.0 or more)
"Realistic needs and diseases.esp"  (1.9.9 or more)
=Future Plans=
After all bug fixed, I'll make some new dishes using pumpkins & cocoa.
In addition I want to enhance the compatibility to "HearthFire".
These features will be provided as optional patch
author: SasameSnow
